attributes.action: to save the green space known as Peoples Park Sudbury Suffolk from building development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This inner Town green space has been an area of amenity for local people since the 13th Century, in the 90's it was sold by the Trustees to the authorities specifically as a site for a new Hospital. This has now fallen by the wayside and the site should revert back to its original purpose.
